## hpr0283 :: Convert Ogg to MP3

 Convert Ogg to MP3monsterb, threethirty, klaatu, and Peter64 talk about audio converters.ffmpeg is a command line tool to convert multimedia files between formats.Linux Cranks Oggcast forum thread on converting Ogg to MP3.Perl Audio Converter is a tool for converting multiple audio types from one format to another.SoundConverter - GNOME Sound Conversion.SoX is a cross-platform command line utility that can convert various formats of computer audio files in to other formats.
